name: How Can You Miss From This Distance
description:
One of my favorite movies of all time is Goodfellas. My college friends and I have been quoting the movie ad nauseum for over 25 years. And one of the lines we quoted often was “How can you miss from this distance?” I had been looking forward to the day I could lovingly mock my own child for missing a shot that just about any adult could drop right in. A lighthearted moment that would surely resonate during their formative years.

3480x2160 JPEG

Photo by Jason Charnick
Taken in the Bronx, NY, USA
